title: Pantomath Capital Advisors appoints Ajay Jain managing partner, Investment Banking
description: Ajay Jain, formerly chairman & managing director at Monal Capital, and executive director of Centrum Capital will lead the Business Development vertical of the Investment Banking Division at Pantomath.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
